mt.name: product_version
mt.def: Release number of the data file

mt.name: project_name
mt.def: Name of project that has originally created the data

mt.name: software_version
mt.def: Name of sofware with version number for the software used to produce the data

mt.name: references
mt.def: References that describe the data or the methods used to produce it

mt.name: history
mt.def: Provides an audit trail for modifications to the original data

mt.name: area
mt.def: Geographical coverage. Comma-separated list of names taken from a list of predefined values

mt.name: grid_projection
mt.def: Description of geographical projection used to store the data. Either 'lat-lon' or a grid_mapping_name (CF convention appendix F)

mt.name: bounding_box
mt.def: geographical bounding_box given as comma-separated string with 'east, south, west, north' with east, west between -180 and 180 and south, north between -90 and 90 (degrees)

mt.name: latitude_resolution
mt.def: distance between gridlines in latitude direction (degrees)

mt.name: longitude_resolution
mt.def: distance between gridlines in longitude direction (degrees)

mt.name: minimum_altitude
mt.def: Minimum altitude (negative for depth)

mt.name: maximum_altitude
mt.def: Maximum altitude (negative for depth)

mt.name: altitude_resolution
mt.def: Thicknes of altitude levels

mt.name: datacollection_period
mt.def: Period of datacollection. Format: YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD

mt.name: start_date
mt.def: Start-date of the data in UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS UTC

mt.name: stop_date
mt.def: Stop-date of the data in UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS UTC

mt.name: field_type
mt.def: hourly/daily/weekly/monthly/yearly/n-hourly/n-daily/n-weekly/monthly climatology

mt.name: forecast_range
mt.def: Time range of forecast, e.g: n-days forecast

mt.name: forecast_type
mt.def: 'hindcast', 'nowcast' or 'forecast'

mt.name: institution
mt.def: Data provider name

mt.name: Platform_name
mt.def: Name of wessel or other platform

mt.name: PI_name
mt.def: Name of Prinsipal Investigator

mt.name: contact
mt.def: User desk E-mail

mt.name: distribution_statement
mt.def: Taken from a list of predefined alternatives

mt.name: operational_status
mt.def: Statement like: 'under development', 'operational', 'experimental'

mt.name: quality_index
mt.def: Code value (0-3)

mt.name: variable
mt.def: Variable name taken from the CF standard name list

mt.name: topic
mt.def: Topic name taken from the GCMD code list (level 2 and 3)

mt.name: activity_type
mt.def: Short descripion of data-producing activity (e.g. cruise, experiment etc.)

mt.name: instrument_type
mt.def: Short descripion of instrument used

mt.name: spatial_resolution
mt.def: Approximate distance between grid points

mt.name: metadata_standard
mt.def: Short descripion of metadata standards used

mt.name: file_format
mt.def: File format. One of: GRIB|BUFR|netCDF|netCDF/CF|HDF|HDF-EOS|HDF5|Excel|CSV|ASCII|Other

mt.name: format_description
mt.def: Free text descripion of data format

mt.name: gtsInstancePattern
mt.def: Pattern to locate data in GTS

mt.name: gtsFileIdentifier
mt.def: Identifier for data in GTS

mt.name: data_file_location
mt.def: The location of the dataset on disk. Only for level 2 datasets

mt.name: data_file_size
mt.def: The size of the file in bytes. Only for level 2 datasets

mt.name: dataref
mt.def: URL reference to data, or short name

mt.name: dataref_OPENDAP
mt.def: URL reference to OPeNDAP service

mt.name: dataref_WMS
mt.def: URL to WMS service (without GetCapabilities)

mt.name: dataref_HTTP
mt.def: URL where data file can be downloaded

mt.name: timeseries
mt.def: List of variables to visualise in time series
